_Synopsis_  
The refresher session is designed to share and discuss learning environments that help promote studentsâ€™ engagement. Participants will be introduced to several simple techniques of implementing interactive learning activities and aligning them with the intended outcome and assessment. The session will also discuss ways of incorporating Cooperative Learning principles using available tools to support and engage students in their learning process.
